25 May 2020 • on text analysis, text similarities, sentiment analysis, stylometric analysis

L10 Text Analysis IV: Working with Abstract Concepts — Sentiment Analysis, Stylometric Analysis

Goals:

  • introduce text analysis approaches:
    • semantic analysis
    • stylometric analysis

Software:

  • R

In Class

Data: Richmond’s Dispatch (1861-186)

In TSV format (the files are the same as before):

  • Year 1981
  • Year 1982
  • Year 1983
  • Year 1984

Materials for stylometric tests:

  • Main data and scripts: Github repository; Quick Link
  • Additional materials: corpora of English and German novels; a sample of Arabic texts for a rolling stylometry experiment.

Workbook

  • Let’s work with this workbook: L10_Worksheet_TextAnalysis04.Rmd.zip. (For your reference, a knitted workbook can also be found here).

Reference Materials

  • given in the workbook

Homework:

  • given in the workbook

Submitting homework:

  • Homework assignment must be submitted by the beginning of the next class;
  • Email your homework to the instructor as attachments.
    • In the subject of your email, please, add the following: 070184-LXX-HW-YourLastName-YourMatriculationNumber, where LXX is the numnber of the lesson for which you submit homework; YourLastName is your last name; and YourMatriculationNumber is your matriculation number.
